EmailTemplate.description: This Email template is used to notify DMM about NDR Part Approval when GPMS Signal is received from GPMS
EmailTemplate.name: Email Alert for Opp Part Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: NDR {!Opportunity.NDR_Quote_Document_Number__c} Awaiting Approval : {!Opportunity.End_Customer_Name__c} / {!Opportunity.NDR_Sold_to_Account_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName}, {!Opportunity.Account} has submitted an NDR for your review. Please click {!Opportunity.NDR_Quote_Document_Number__c} to review the NDR in Salesforce.com.
Regards
TE Team
